ISSUE.TITLE: Update private repo params as structure JSON (not yaml string)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Content of params (private variable) during update is expected yaml string format . It would be easier if params KVP can be accepted in json format. Below returns : 500 Internal Server Error ``` curl -v -X PUT "http://droneio.xyz.com/api/repos/github.com/npateriya/godemo?access_token=XYZ" -d `{“params”: { “hello”: “world” } }` ``` Yaml param for single variable works but not sure how to embed multiple KVP yaml in json. ``` curl -v -X PUT "http://droneio.xyz.com/api/repos/github.com/npateriya/godemo?access_token=XYZ" -d `{“params”: “hello: world” }` ```
